snippet: Fresh from college and graduate schools, the children of some prominent dynasties are taking a different path, spurning their legacies in retailing, real estate and finance for a future in technology.
abstract: Fresh from college and graduate schools, the children of some prominent dynasties are taking a different path, spurning their legacies in retailing, real estate and finance for a future in technology.

headline.main: Heirs to Old Money Plunge Into Tech
headline.print_headline: Heirs to Old Money Plunge Into Tech
